net.jnellis.binpack

Class SpliceableBinPacker

  • Object
    • net.jnellis.binpack.BinPacker<Double,Double,LinearBin>
      • net.jnellis.binpack.LinearBinPacker
        • net.jnellis.binpack.SpliceableBinPacker

  • public class SpliceableBinPacker
extends LinearBinPacker
    A LinearBinPacker that pre-processes input pieces before packing. Each piece that is larger than the maximum available capacity of a new bin (not an existing bin), is broken up into pieces of that maximum capacity size, plus a remainder piece, if one exists, that is smaller than the maximum capacity.

    The dividing of pieces too big takes place in-order and before the call to order pieces by the set preOrderPolicy before packing.

    • Method Detail

      • packAll

        public List<LinearBin> packAll(List<Double> pieces,
                               List<LinearBin> existingBins,
                               List<Double> availableCapacities)
        Description copied from class: BinPacker
        Attempts to store pieces into bins, starting with existingBins. When a new bin is required, one is copied from the availableCapacities set according to the existingBinPreOrderPolicy.
        Overrides:
        packAll in class BinPacker<Double,Double,LinearBin>
        Parameters:
        pieces - List of pieces to be packed.
        existingBins - The initial set of bins will be made with these capacities.
        availableCapacities - An array of bin capacities we can make when we need another bin.
        Returns:
        Returns the modified list of existingBins

      • createSplicePieces

        public static List<Double> createSplicePieces(Iterable<Double> pieces,
                                              Double maxCapacity)
        Finds and replaces pieces that are longer than the maximum capacity with however many maximum capacity sized pieces plus a remainder piece. Natural order is maintained with pieces exploded as they are iterated through.
        Parameters:
        pieces - list of pieces to pack
        maxCapacity - list of available maxCapacity.
        Returns:
        Returns the new list of pieces.
